long_description: The Ortlieb Trunk bag offers robust protection against the elements and easy access to your riding essentials. Plus, it offers easy off-bike carrying thanks to the included shoulder strap. Constructed out of coated Cordura(R) nylon for exceptional protection from the elements; rated to ensure protection when immersed in water up to 1 meter deep for 3 min. TIZIP(R) zipper supplies water- and dustproof protection and offers straightforward entry to the main compartment of the trunk bag. Small internal zip pocket helps organize contents within main compartment. 2 external zippered neoprene pockets offer easy access to small neccessities; external pockets are not waterproof. Includes a padded shoulder strap for easy off-bike transportation of the trunk bag; please note: shoulder strap must be fixed and stowed away prior to riding. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility. Discreet loop lets you affix a rear blinky light to the Ortlieb Trunk Bag (light sold separately). Designed to fit most rear bike racks with the included adapter.
short_description: The Ortlieb Trunk bag offers robust protection against the elements and easy access to your riding essentials. Plus, it offers easy off-bike carrying thanks to the included shoulder strap.
